short_summary: GROUND KEEPING AND SNOW REMOVAL AT NRC ROYALMOUNT BUILDING
description: The objective of this RFP is to provide the Contractor with operational service requirements for the ground maintenance, snow and ice control, and waste operations for the Grounds Maintenance and Snow Removal Contract. The Contractor must be solely responsible for providing at its own cost all operational services on all lands/campuses within the scope of this Contract. The Contractor will be responsible for any rehabilitation, damages or replacement costs resulting from the absence or lack of service and maintenance on the part of the Contractor.
